entry.title: Curated List To Help Kids Learning

link.title: Curated List To Help Kids Learning

entry.content:
Hello All,

My name is Kin Shah and I have created this curated list of useful sites (mostly free) that I found useful from twitter. This is my humble effort to help all parents and their kids in this most needed times. Also, this list will help parents focus on their kids learning and keep them engage/focused :

Note: Some are completely free and some are free for the rest of school year. Thanks to all the sites that have put in effort to help kids learn during this COVID-19 Pandemic ! This is a work in progress. Feel free to make a Pull Request (PR) and I will merge the changes where appropriate.

  • SCHOLASTIC LEARN AT HOME: Day-by-day projects to keep kids reading, thinking and growing.
  • LEARNING A-Z
  • PBS LEARNING MEDIA
  • BRAINPOP
  • NÀT GEO 4 KIDS
  • VOOKS
  • ABCYA
  • HIGHLIGHTS KIDS
  • BOOM LEARNING
  • STORYLINE ONLINE
  • TIME FOR KIDS : Time For Kids Digital Library for Free For The Rest Of The School Year
  • ABC MOUSE
  • GONOODLE : Engages kids with movement and mindfulness videos created by child development experts
  • WONDEROPOLIS
  • Youtube Learning At Home
  • AudibleFromAmazon
  • Khan academy Kids – Completely Free Online Courses for Kids Age 2-18
    • Detailed Schedule
  • iRobot Offline activity
  • Happy Numbers
  • Transum Mathematics
  • 175+ Amazing Online Learning Resources
  • 60+ Awesome Websites for Teaching and Learning Math
  • Duolingo - learn a language
  • Scratch - by MIT
  • Newsela : Free Access to Newsela’s Entire Product Suite for the Rest of the 2019/2020 School Year. Be sure to join as a Parent or Homeschool Teacher
  • Education.com: Basic Members (free to join, click sign up in upper right corner) Free Access to some of our best Premium Resources
    • Education.com provies independent activities package which is excellent for all ages (PreK through 5th Grade).
  • KidActivities.net: Lesson Plans, Fun Games, Activities, Jokes, Riddles for Kids

  • KidLitTV: Free Children’s Literature through Video and Podcasts

  • Outschool.com: Classes available for Free to families in the U.S. who have been impacted by school closures and are facing financial hardship.
  • Prodigy.com: Free Full Curriculum Access for students in Grades 1-8
  • hammermill: Fun Family Activities
  • LUNCH DOODLES with Mo Willems ! @ the Kennedy Center: New episodes will be posted each weekday at 1:00 p.m. ET and then remain online to be streamed afterwards. Check back each weekday for new LUNCH DOODLES!

  • Dads worksheets: DadsWorksheets.com has been one of the web’s top ranked sources of free math learning materials since 2008.

  • Virtual Tours of
    • Yellowstone National Park
    • Louvre
    • Great Wall of China
    • San Diego Zoo: Free Access to Live Cams to Various Animals like Penguins, Polar Bears and more

Thank you !

~ Kin Shah
